intro: Jossinia lucida, commonly known as the silverleaf jossinia, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its glossy, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white flowers that bloom throughout the year. Its leaves are often used in traditional medicine for their purported healing properties. The plant thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories.
